description: The inappropriate implementation in the Extensions API of Chromium, which is relied upon by Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based), serves as the root technical issue leading to this CVE. This flaw primarily exists within the open-source Chromium project that Microsoft Edge integrates. The specific build numbers that address this deficiency are 118.0.2088.46, and it has been documented under the KB article ID KB-118.0.2088.46.
